attributes.action: Respect the wishes of the majority and not have another E.U referendum.
attributes.additional_details: The evidence is the fact that the votes were counted and leave won. Not everyone can be pleased this is why we vote. Ifa second EU referendum is called democracy has failed.
attributes.background: There is alot of talk about a second EU referendum yet I haven't seen a petition supporting the strong willed leave campaign. So I feel the majority need a voice and a petition to stop a second referendum.
